insert into teach_course_node (id, school_id, course_node_init_id, cycle_id, cycle_year, cycle_semester, node, node_name, start_time, end_time, morning_afternoon, week, create_time, update_time, update_by, del_flag, summer_winter_time) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.schoolId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.courseNodeInitId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cycleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cycleYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cycleSemester,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.node,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.nodeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.startTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.endTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.morningAfternoon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.week,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.summerWinterTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
